attributes.action: Move the UK Parliament to other member nations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the interests of democracy and fairness, the UK Parliament should be moved from England to Scotland for a while, for example the next 50 - 300 years, then to Wales, then to Northern Ireland and so on.

This would help make the people of the other allegedly equal UK nations feel like they are equal and respected and an integral part of the UK.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
